hero.headline: Welcome to my portfolio!
hero.subheadline: I'm currently an AI & Software Engineer at @Avvale, and I do freelance too, plus heavily active on Twitter/X sharing my progress and story.

about.summary:
Hi! I'm Iván. I'm an AI & Software Engineer currently based in Madrid, but I was born and raised in Isla de Margarita, Venezuela (take a look if you'd like here).

Interests

In my free time, I like to play some sports, see movies and to be around with my hometown friends. 

Fun facts 

I'm not a enjoyer of old movies, or songs for that matter, but I'm beginning to take a hang of it.
Currently learning to dance Salsa!
I love reading about history, journalism, politics, economics and things about how our world works.
My favorite dish is my grandma's lasagna :)

contact.text: Based in Madrid. Always open to collaborate!

blogPosts.title: My AI Stack Is for Solving Boring Work
blogPosts.summary: Why I obsess over pragmatic agents: scoped context windows, ruthless observability, and using LLMs only when latency and cost prove the ROI.

blogPosts.title: Venezuela Wants Builders, Not Saviors
blogPosts.summary: Notes from my trips home: talent is everywhere, trust is scarce, and the real leverage is small funds plus patient execution in local currency.

blogPosts.title: Crypto Rails as Emergency Exit
blogPosts.summary: How I use stablecoins and onchain rails as a resilience plan—multi-sig treasuries, compliance guardrails, and custody discipline learned the hard way.

blogPosts.title: Watching the Economy Like an Engineer
blogPosts.summary: The macro dashboard on my desk: liquidity, shipping costs, labor churn, and how each signal shapes the projects I greenlight.

blogPosts.title: Capitalism as a Craft, Not a Dogma
blogPosts.summary: Personal rules for building companies: profit with constraints, equity for contributors, and ruthless clarity on who owns the downside.

blogPosts.title: Taming Consumism in My Own Routine
blogPosts.summary: I track cravings like metrics—cutting pointless upgrades, buying local, and investing surplus into community experiments instead of gadgets.

branding.title: Iván Caamaño - AI & Software Engineer
branding.description: AI & Software Engineer building production-grade agents, ML systems, and scalable platforms.
